TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontNamesConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 在包含字型名稱清單的字串與代表個別名稱的字串陣列之間轉換。

span.span: Converts between a string containing a list of font names and an array of strings representing the individual names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用轉換包含一份包含個別名稱的字串陣列的字型名稱的單一字串，這個類別的方法。Use the method of this class to convert a single string containing a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. 每個字串中的字型名稱必須以逗號分隔。Each font name in the string must be separated by a comma. 例如，字串"新細明體，逾新 roman，新細明體"，將轉換成陣列，其中包含字串"新細明體"、"次新細明體"和"新細明體"。For example, the string "arial, times new roman, verdana", converts to an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana". 請注意，逗號會移除以及任何的泛空白字元開頭或結尾的字型名稱。Notice the commas are removed along with any white space at the beginning or end of the font name. 字型名稱的中間的泛空白字元不會移除。White space in the middle of a font name is not removed. 方法會執行反向作業。The method performs the reverse operation. 它會將轉換包含個別字型名稱，以單一字串，包含一份名稱的字串陣列。It converts an array of strings containing the individual font names to a single string containing a list of the names. 比方說，包含字串"新細明體"、"次新細明體"和"新細明體"的陣列將轉換成字串"新細明體，逾新 roman，新細明體"。For example, an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana" converts to the string "arial,times new roman,verdana". 請注意，逗號會自動插入之間沒有任何泛空白字元的字型名稱。Notice that commas are automatically inserted between the font names without any white space. 呼叫方法以驗證可以呼叫之前，先進行轉換方法。Call the method to verify that the conversion can be made before calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別將使用的字型名稱清單字串轉換成包含個別名稱的字串陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to convert a string with a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. 然後轉換成單一字串傳回，顯示的字串陣列。The array of strings is then converted back to a single string and displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: How to: Implement a Type Converter
Type Converter Sample

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您永遠不應該直接存取型別轉換子。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反地，藉由呼叫適當的轉換程式物件。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例。For more information, see the examples in .

summary.span: 判斷這個轉換子是否能夠轉換指定資料型別的物件成為包含個別字型名稱的字串陣列。

span.span: Determines whether this converter can convert an object of the specified data type to an array of strings containing individual font names.

returns.span: 如果型別可以轉換則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the type can be converted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以判斷指定的資料型別是否可轉換成包含個別字型名稱的字串陣列。Use the method to determine whether the specified data type can be converted to an array of strings containing individual font names. > [!NOTE] > 這個轉換子可以轉換只會從`string`資料型別。This converter can convert only from a `string` data type. `sourceType`參數必須是型別。The `sourceType` parameter must be of type . 否則，這個方法會傳回`false`表示指定的資料類型，無法轉換。Otherwise, this method returns `false` to indicate that the specified data type cannot be converted. 您可以選擇性地傳入`null`針對`context`參數。You can optionally pass in `null` for the `context` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 範例會判斷指定的資料類型是否可轉換成字串陣列，包含個別字型名稱，然後再執行轉換。The example determines whether the specified data type can be converted to an array of strings that contains the individual font names before performing the conversion. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將轉換包含一份包含個別名稱的字串陣列的字型名稱的字串。Use the method to convert a string containing a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. 每個字串中的字型名稱必須以逗號分隔。Each font name in the string must be separated by a comma. 例如，字串"新細明體，逾新 roman，新細明體"，將轉換成陣列，其中包含字串"新細明體"、"次新細明體"和"新細明體"。For example, the string "arial, times new roman, verdana", converts to an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana". 請注意，逗號會移除任何開頭或結尾的字型名稱的空白字元以及。Notice that the commas are removed along with any white space at the beginning or end of the font name. 字型名稱的中間的泛空白字元不會移除。White space in the middle of a font name is not removed. > [!NOTE] > `context`和`culture`參數不會用於此版本的方法; 它們是保留供未來版本的方法。The `context` and `culture` parameters are not used in this version of the method; they are reserved for future versions of the method. 您可以選擇性地傳入`null`為這些參數。You can optionally pass in `null` for these parameters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以將一份字型名稱的字串轉換成包含個別名稱的字串陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to convert a string with a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. summary.span: 從包含個別字型名稱的字串陣列，建立表示字型名稱清單的字串。

span.span: Creates a string that represents a list of font names from an array of strings containing individual font names.

returns.span: 執行個體，表示包含字型名稱清單的字串。

span.span: A instance that represents a string containing a list of font names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將轉換包含個別字型名稱，以單一字串，包含一份名稱的字串陣列。Use the method to convert an array of strings containing the individual font names to a single string containing a list of the names. 比方說，包含字串"新細明體"、"次新細明體"和"新細明體"的陣列將轉換成字串"新細明體，逾新 roman，新細明體"。For example, an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana" converts to the string "arial,times new roman,verdana". 請注意，逗號會自動插入之間沒有任何泛空白字元的字型名稱。Notice that commas are automatically inserted between the font names without any white space. > [!NOTE] > 這個轉換器只能轉換`string`資料型別。This converter can convert only to a `string` data type. `destinationType`參數必須是型別。The `destinationType` parameter must be of type . > [!NOTE] > `context`和`culture`參數不會用於此版本的方法; 它們是保留供未來版本的方法。The `context` and `culture` parameters are not used in this version of the method; they are reserved for future versions of the method. 您可以選擇性地傳入`null`為這些參數。You can optionally pass in `null` for these parameters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將轉換包含以單一字串，包含字型名稱清單的個別名稱的字串陣列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to convert an array of strings containing the individual names to a single string that contains a list of font names. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
